evaluation

Class SearchEngineEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • evaluation.SearchEngineEvaluator

  • public class SearchEngineEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple search engine evaluator computing (recall, precision) points for a single query. It is assumed that the search engine would return results and that there are expected results for all queries.
    Author:
    Pierre Tirilly
